subject: Public Speaking
title: Humor Across Cultures
description: A micro-lesson that makes Humor Across Cultures usable.

hook.text: Sarcasm works in New York. It offends in Tokyo. Know the difference.

buildup.text: Humor is culturally specific. What's funny varies enormously.

discovery.text: Self-deprecating humor works in some cultures, not others.

twist.text: Test humor with cultural insiders before using it publicly.

climax.text: Safe humor builds connection. Risky humor destroys it.

punchline.text: Test your humor. Cultural mismatch kills.

quiz.question: Why is humor risky across cultures?
options: What's funny varies enormously by culture
